Statute.Title: Canadair Limited Divestiture Authorization Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Aliénation de Canadair Limitée, Loi autorisant l’)

General.Text: Consequential, s. 8 (see R.S., c. 44 (2nd Supp.), s. 1
